title: Data Cleaning & Validation
overview: This section helps you clean and validate data for analysis. Cleaning makes sure the data is reliable and ready to use, while validation ensures it meets certain rules or standards. This is a key skill in the data journey and Assessment Method 1 of the ST0795 EPA.

skills: Spot and fill in blank cells where possible
Use sorting and filtering to find inconsistencies
levels.task: Open the messy sales data and remove duplicate Customer IDs, fill in blanks where appropriate, and check date formats.

skills: Use formulas like IF, ISBLANK, TRIM, CLEAN
Use conditional formatting to highlight issues
Apply data validation to restrict inputs
levels.task: Use formulas and conditional formatting to highlight rows with missing names or invalid dates. Apply validation to the 'Amount' column.

skills: Use Power Query to remove errors and reformat columns
Create a reusable query that auto-cleans imported data
Handle nulls, incorrect data types, and currency symbols
levels.task: Import the same file into Power Query. Clean up the data, remove symbols, promote headers, and change column types.
